description:
(Time and Space Travel Unconditional) – Book 1

– – – – –

It was her fault for killing an ant to death with her own hand.

That was why she got 'kidnapped' by this ant spirit to ancient times, then leaving her behind and it went happily with its beloved fiancé!

She is a modern woman, and her expertise is not much benefit here. How can she survive in this old era?!

Considered as a blessing, on her first day of arrival, she saved a big landlord by her mouth..

In order for him to repay her, he had agreed to her every request.

Well, since she can’t go back now and there’s a rich landlord who can fulfill whatever she needs.

She might as well stay and enjoy the privilege of being pampered and spoilt by him──

But she never imagined that he actually had other intention behind…>
